title: My Nephew Is a Disappointment to Me
description:
Tammy is angry that her nephew hasn't done more to comfort her since her mother died. - Dr. Laura: "Turning pain into anger is a common coping technique."

Have you ever lashed out at someone in anger while you were grieving? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. 

Find me on social media at:

Facebook.com/DrLaura

Instagram.com/DrLauraProgram
